argument.description: A char, varchar2, nchar, or nvarchar2 value that will be converted to single-byte characters. This function will return its result in the same character set as char.

returnType: The TO_SINGLE_BYTE function returns a single byte value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL TO_SINGLE_BYTE function returns a character value with all of the multibyte characters converted to single-byte characters. To use this function, your database character set contains both single-byte and multibyte characters.
sample:
select TO_SINGLE_BYTE('Tech on the net')
from dual;
